stages.logText: I noticed a locked door in Crossglen's supply cache. I should talk to Odair about it.
Odair told me that Leta's deceased father used to store his crop in a locked cellar within the supply cave. The key to this cellar may still be somewere in Leta's house. I should take a look.
I found a conspicous key in Leta's basement. I should go and try if it unlock the door in the cave.
The door is open now. I wonder what is behind it.
There is a huge storage room that still has useful stuff in it. I should tell Odair.
Odair was really happy to hear about the useful cellar that I discovered. I gave him the key so that the storage space can be used by our village.
